CustomEventInitCustomEvent.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The CustomEvent.initCustomEvent() method initializes a object.
If the event has already been dispatched, this method does nothing.

remarks.para:
Events initialized in this way must have been created with the method.
This method must be called to set the event before it is dispatched using .
Once dispatched, it doesn't do anything anymore.

para.strong: Do not use this method anymore, as it is deprecated.

blockquote.para:
Rather than using the feature, instead use specific event constructors, like .
The page on Creating and triggering events gives more information about the way to use those.

remarks.para:
-
-The constructor to use instead of this deprecated method: .
